name: Meet God Under the Neon Lights
name_original: Meet God Under the Neon Lights
description:
Great love requires great sacrifice.

Play as a minion for a godlike figure in a mysterious town. Feed Him his chosen meal to KEEP HIM ALIVE.

Satisfy his hunger for 4 nights and you might just get to meet him...

Controls:

WASD to navigate

QE to strafe

SHIFT to sprint

mouse controls spotlight

left click to shoot projectile when locked on

walk over citizens to pick them up.
